statements: DELETE FROM reports_on_water_usage WHERE report_id = 1 AND report_date = '2022-01-10';
DELETE FROM irrigation_system WHERE system_name = 'Drip Irrigation System' AND no_of_sensors > 5;
DELETE FROM SensorData WHERE temperature > 30 AND moisture_level < 50;
DELETE FROM PerformanceReport WHERE sensor_id = 101 AND performance_rating = 'Excellent';
DELETE FROM SensorData WHERE date = '2022-01-15' AND time = '08:30:00';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE system_id = 3 AND maintenance_date = '2022-10-15';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE system_id = 123 AND maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
